featured.text: I was not surprised, but I was ___(32)___ annoyed.
If you put a ______ under a leaking faucet, you will be surprised at the amount of water collected in 24 hours.
They don’t look too revolutionary, but you’d be surprised __20__
Many of us were quite surprised.
It didn’t taste that bad, but I was surprised to find it had 40 more calories than the meat version!

definition.zh_def: 感到驚訝或意外的情緒。
definition.example: She was surprised to see her old friend at the party.
